name: Motion JPEG Video
summary: Learn about .MJPEG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The M-JPEG format is easily editable, but takes up a sizable amount of disk space. The format is used by media players, web browsers, digital cameras, consoles, video cameras, and streaming servers.
NOTE: The .MJPG extension is more common than the MJPEG extension.

description: A file with .mjpeg (Motion JPEG) extension is a video file that is created by compressing an individual video frame as a JPEG image. It is different from the standard MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 file formats where the compression is interframes and is decided based on the prediction of contents in subsequent frames. MJPEG is supported by a wide range of applications that include web browsers, media players, digital cameras, webcams, streaming servers. Plug-ins are available for applications that want to make use of the MJPEG file format.
Video file compressed using the Motion JPEG (M-JPEG or MJPEG) format commonly created by digital cameras, webcams, and other mobile devices; consists of a sequence of .JPEG images.
